original_title: Marineros: Men in the Middle of the Sea
overview: Dennis Marisol is a principled man who lives a comfortable life with his family in Bohol, thanks to the lucrative salary he earns onboard a tanker ship. But life was not always easy for Dennis, he misses most of special family occasions and holidays, his wife died while he was away, and worse, he lost his eyesight due to a shipboard accident.
tagline: What are you willing to sacrifice for the sake of your family?
title: Marineros: Men in the Middle of the Sea
